name: Bullet Defense 1980
description:
Just like the classic arcade game!

Defend cities with ground-to air missiles, and try to get a score as high as possible

Now with more explosions, more incoming ICBMs and your own nuclear weapon against the incoming missiles!

With simple graphics and simple mechanics, but surely with a good need for tactics and strategy

Controls:

Z/Left click: Shoot missile towards mouse

X/Right click: Fire missiles at maximum speed from all launchers. Caution, very destructive, and consumes a lot of bullets

C: Launch nuclear weapon towards mouse pointer. This will destroy all of the incoming missiles on screen
